name: Falhu
description:
A Maldivian explorer went out to explore a uninhabited island. But the plane crashed into the middle of the ocean.

This game is still being made. Also there might be some mistakes, bugs or errors in the game so report anything.

For older versions or reporting of something, contact : floyd7525@gmail.com

Version 1.02

*Fixed mouse problem.

*Audio organized

*Fixed graphics
